text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hm… Hmmmmmmmm! 
Ah, nothing is coming to mind at all!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Trainer… Sorry for worrying you. 
Hah… just what even is originality?
Some time has passed since I became in charge of Win Variation. Currently, she is engaged in a fierce struggle figuring out a dance class assignment.

text_block_list.name: Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
—My, Shion! That was a perfect step! 
You got it in one go from my demonstration!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, thank you very much! 
Ehehe… my ballet experience is quite handy, ain't it.

text_block_list.name: Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Ballet? No wonder then! Keep giving it your all then. 
…Hm, I think that's enough for today. I'll give the assignment now.

text_block_list.name: Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Everyone must prepare and present an original 1 minute dance! 
The song and genre is up to you guys. There'll be a test in the next class～!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
An original dance… 
Hm?… A-and we have to make it from scratch!?
I knew from the time that we spent together that her weak point was "creativeness". She's great when it comes to following conventions and rules, but when she's told to "feel free"…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah! 
Something like this should be a strong point of mine…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
And yet, out of everything it's the thing I'm the weakest at… 
Damn, what am I even…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…No, that's no good! 
Grumbling won't do me any good.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I shouldn't be thinking like that. 
Even if I'm bad at it, I just have to give it my all…
choice_data_list: No… I understand how you feel.

text_block_list.text: Anyone would want to showcase their strong points during a test. However, if their weak points were shown instead, they'd feel angry and frustrated…
choice_data_list: I got it, how about expressing that feeling?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Huh? This… murky and irritating feeling?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
! Trainer… yeah. 
You're totally right.
choice_data_list: Anger and frustration, turn it into strength!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Aight!
Although, due to my work piling up, I won't be able to watch her create this dance in person, so I apologized to her for that. But then…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, not at all! Even you're busy with your own things. 
I should be the one apologizing.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
But we're all good! You gave me an amazing hint. 
I'll try and give it my best on my own!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hah! Heh! This ain't different from the usual! 
What the heck!? Be creative!!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Stupid Variation! Get your head into the game! I'll break through this! This isn't "Free"!!

text_block_list.name: Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text: ——Now next we have… Win Variation. If you would.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
—Breath in… 
Breath out… Hng!

text_block_list.name: Dance Instructor
text_block_list.text:
! It's here! This deep resentment… I can feel it clearly! 
This is… chained down by a tragic fate, a swan that breaks out with lament and rage!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Hooooray! I passed! 
Ehehe, it was all thanks to the advice Trainer gave me!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: I learned a lot from the comments made on it, I'm happy I worked so hard on it… I got something good to report to Trainer♪

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me. 
Trainer! Um, my dance assignment today…
choice_data_list: —Yes, that thing from a few days ago…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Wah, they're in a call! Gulp…
choice_data_list: Yes… yes, I'll add it to the—

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (You really are busy, aren't you. Your desk is cluttered… even your computer… I wonder how many files you have opened…)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
(I… shouldn't make that report now, huh… 
then again, it's not like it was anything major.)
choice_data_list: I'll be hanging up now— Sorry! I'm done now!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
G-good job today. I should be the one that's sorry… 
Bothering you when you're busy.
choice_data_list: No, no, it's fine. Anyways, what's up?
No, no, it's fine. Anyways, what's up?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah, um… the assignment! I passed it.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Uh… passed with flying colors! It was thanks to your advice. Thank you very much for that.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Well then, excuse me! 
Sorry for bothering you when you were busy!
